name: Sisyphish
description:
A VR obstacle course about the struggles of game development, dealing with burnout, motivation, and a search for meaning - skinned as a salmon swimming upstream. Traverse increasingly hostile and alien environments as the world beats down on you, pushing onward, through the current, to whatever your goal may be.

Controls/Gameplay:

Swimming near obstacles grants skill points, while crashing into them makes you lose points. These points are necessary to access the rest stops across the river, giving the player a chance to get their bearings back and recover your built-up stress.

(The downloadable file may not work right now, never published a VR game before and I don't currently have access to my headset in order to check. )
